channel.title: If license key binded to device once it wont let you use another key to register on same device
channel.description: I give people free 1 day trial and they using it to register. But if trial key expires they are using another trial key and using again. HWID Lock already on. Is there a way to block situation?

item.title: If license key binded to device once it wont let you use another key to register on same device
item.dc:creator: xav
item.description:
Could add each user hwid to a list to check before being able to claim trial key. If the HWID already exists in the list then have it error out and close.

Read full topic
